overview: Please refer to Research Project – WH Part 1
ilo: Select, summarise and critically appraise published research in an area of population health
Formulate a research question based upon a synthesis of the published research evidence
Design and justify an appropriate research design to answer a research question in population health
Conduct supervised research in a specific area of population health research
Communicate the method and findings of a research project in oral and written form

Inherent requirements (core participatio.content: Further details on how to seek academic adjustments can be found on the Student Equity and Disability Support website:http://services.unimelb.edu.au/student-equity/home
